sentences.en: Can I use NEW and DELETE in my kernel?
sentences.cn: 我可以在内核里面用new和delete 吗 ?

sentences.en: Delete backspace and erase one character or number entry.
sentences.cn: Delete退后一格并删除一条字符或数字项.

sentences.en: Delete what is dispensable and give more prominence to the essentials.
sentences.cn: 可以不说的去掉,该说的就可以更突出.

sentences.en: His name was deleted from the list.
sentences.cn: 他的名字从名单上删掉了。

sentences.en: I deleted the file by mistake.
If you delete several words, we can put the whole story on one page.
sentences.cn: 如果你删去几个字, 我们可把整个故事写在一页上.

sentences.en: In the user administration module, you can delete users as administration authority.
sentences.cn: 管理员管理用户界面,主要是对用户删除操作.

sentences.en: Management Interface part of the existing library management: delete, view.
sentences.cn: 管理界面部分现有图书管理: 删除, 查看.

sentences.en: Moderated online amend, delete, change information, such as the response function . 3.
sentences.cn: 版主在线修改, 删除, 更改资料, 回复等功能.

sentences.en: Most computer programs introduce or delete the dependent variables in a stepwise manner.
sentences.cn: 大部分计算机程序均以逐级计算方式来输入或删除某些应变量.

sentences.en: Select "Delete all" from the drop-down list.
sentences.cn: 在下拉列表项中选择“全部删除”。

sentences.en: The shipper always asks the opening bank to delete this stipulation.
sentences.cn: 托运人总是要求开户行删除这一条款.

sentences.en: The Windows Calculator allows the Backspace and Delete keys, so you should try them.
sentences.cn: Windows计算器允许Backspace和Delete键, 所以您应该测试它们.

sentences.en: To remove an NI - DAQmx simulated device , right - click the device and click Delete from the pop - up menu.
sentences.cn: 如果要移除 NI -DAQmx模拟设备, 在该设备图标上单击右键,并在弹出菜单中选择Delete即可.

sentences.en: We had asked them to delete him from the communique and crop him from the picture.
sentences.cn: 我们要求他们不把他的名字写入公报,并且把他从照片上剪掉.

sentences.en: We may use the SQL DELETE command to delete a record in a table a database.
sentences.cn: 我们可以使用DELETE命令来删除数据库表单中的一条记录.

sentences.en: We will be pleased to delete the charge from the original invoice.
sentences.cn: 我们决定将这笔费用从原始发票上删去。

words.tran_cn: 删除；[遗] 缺失；删除部分

trans.tran_en: to remove something that has been written down or stored in a computer
to remove something that has been written down or stored in a computer
